name: Bullet Hell SRPG
description:
My entry to Anarch16Sync's 2022 SRPG Studio One-for-All game jam.

UNDERTALE is a genre hybrid of an RPG and a bullet hell. What if I threw a third genre in there?

Bullet Hell SRPG is a Fire Emblem-style Strategy RPG with UNDERTALE-esque timed hit and bullet hell mechanics, programmed from the ground up in SRPG Studio. Step in the shoes of Ignatius: fight through a series of reflex-demanding tournament matches, and realize his destiny...

Position your units smartly, surrounding your foes to unleash stronger attacks as a coordinated team. But keep in mind that enemies, too, will try to surround you to combine their attacks into an even deadlier maelstrom of projectiles in a real-time, bullet hell-style defense phase.
